Class GrcException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.metricstream.grc.api.common.exception.GrcException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmptyCacheException, EmptyQualifierValue, EmptyRelatedFactoryException, GroupValidationException, UnknownFormatPlatformException

    public class GrcException
extends java.lang.Exception
    The class GrcException Exception extending Exception Class
    Any Service layer should catch correct specific Exception and then throw GrcException back.
